writingComment:
Your writing will be corrected by a Korean teacher. 
Please provide answers within the character limit. 
You can expect a response within 24 hours, although it may take longer if there are many requests. 
You'll be notified when the correction is completed. (Only for users who have enabled notifications.) 
Once the correction is complete, you can check it on the writing tab of the main page.
You can make up to 3 requests, and once a response is completed, you can make another one. 
The following cases are not eligible for correction: 
 - Non-Korean writing 
 - Irrelevant or personal questions 
 - Writing that is difficult to understand. 
(It is recommended to practice based on what you have learned)
wantRequestCorrection: Do you want to request a correction?
requestNotAvailableTitle: All correction requests have been used.
requestNotAvailableContent: Please wait a moment until your correction is completed.
noMyWritings: Complete the lesson and try the writing practice. Your writing will be displayed here after correction. (Excludes some lessons, For subscribed users only.)

premiumDetail: Premium is automatically renewed and billed through the payment method registered to your app store account. The price is subject to change without prior notice. Subscriptions will automatically renew at the existing price even if the amount has been increased, unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. If the price has decreased, the subscription will renew at the reduced rate. Subscriptions are user-managed, and you can go to your account settings to cancel auto-renewal at any time. If you cancel your subscription and then resubscribe, you will be charged at the updated price. For any purchase-related issues, please contact us at akorean.help@gmail.com. For more details, please refer to our

replyDetail:
- You can only reply once per message. 

- Your and other users' replies may be posted in the 'Best Replies' section after review by a native teacher. 

- You can read and add 'Best Replies' on your flashcard until the message is expired.

premium1: I'm Jeongwoo Park (Danny), a Korean teacher who developed Podo Korean.
premium3: How long will it take to speak Korean?
premium4: I have two students who are most memorable.
premium5: Harvey, a 26-year-old living in Hong Kong, could not speak Korean at all. He started learning Hangul with me, and over 10 months, we had 53 hours of lessons. Afterward, he was able to discuss education, politics, and science, topics he was interested in, with me in Korean.
premium6: Ellen, a 24-year-old living in Germany, also couldn't speak any Korean at all. She started learning Hangul with me and took 44 hours of lessons over 12 months. After that, she was able to discuss social issues in Korean while reading the news with me.
premium7:
The two students were not only smart but also had a habit of being consistent. Even on busy days, they studied for at least 5 minutes every day. 
Therefore, I think I can answer this question like this:
premium9: - the habit of studying every day
premium10: - the help of a native speaker teacher
premium14: Yes, it is true that the help of a native speaker teacher is the most effective.
premium17:
Two students paid more than $1,000 each for lessons with me. 
But I wished for more students to learn Korean and enjoy Korean culture at an affordable cost. 

So, I included all the lessons they learned by spending $1,000 in this app.
premium19:
Podo Korean is an app for serious Korean learners.
It provides easy and thoroughly detailed lessons based on my real teaching experience.

With just the free lessons, you can master Hangul and engage in simple conversations.

If you wish to learn more diverse and in-depth expressions on various topics, consider subscribing to the premium service.
premium20: You can achieve the effectiveness of expensive lessons at an affordable cost.
aboutDanny1:
I am a certified professional Korean teacher who has been teaching Korean since 2017.

(I have conducted over 2000 lessons with more than 200 students and am continuing to do so.)

At the same time, I am also a language learner like you.

(I have studied English, Japanese, Chinese, and Thai.)

I enjoyed learning languages through apps the most.
And I tried using expressions learned from apps with native speakers.

However,
my native friends said my expressions were awkward.
There were even some words that are no longer used.
aboutDanny2: I couldn't trust language apps anymore.
aboutDanny3:
I became curious about Korean language apps.

It was shocking.
There were so many strange expressions.

As a Korean teacher, I took this issue very seriously.
And I made a decision.
aboutDanny5:
Since then, I started to learn programming languages.

And finally,
I was able to release two Podo apps.
premiumDialog2: For those whose goal is simple conversation, free lessons are sufficient.
premiumDialog3: Podo Korean is an app for serious Korean language learners.

tutorial_course_1:
Nice to meet you! I'm Podo, your Korean learning buddy!
🍇 Did you know 'Podo' means 'Grape' in Korean?
tutorial_course_2:
Want to learn Korean step by step?
In **Topic Mode**, follow a structured curriculum to build your skills!
tutorial_course_3:
Already know some Korean?
**Grammar Mode** lets you focus on specific expressions to level up your skills!
tutorial_course_4: Now, choose your learning path and start speaking Korean today! 🚀
tutorial_lesson_list_1:
Looking for a different course?
Tap this button to switch anytime!
tutorial_lesson_list_2:
Busy schedule? No worries!
**Korean Bites** gives you quick, practical Korean expressions in seconds! Try one now!
tutorial_lesson_list_3:
Got questions?
Join our Discord community for tips, support, and Korean fun!
tutorial_lesson_list_4: Let’s get started! Complete your first lesson now! 🎯
tutorial_lesson_summary_1: Before you begin, check out the **lesson summary** for a quick preview! 👀
tutorial_lesson_summary_2: The lesson includes reading or writing exercises to boost your learning!
tutorial_lesson_summary_3: Ready? Press this button and dive into your lesson! 🚀
tutorial_lesson_complete_1:
Awesome! 🎉
You’ve completed your first lesson! Keep it up!
tutorial_lesson_complete_3: Don’t you want to learn more Korean with Podo Korean?

You’ve unlocked
**7 Days of Free Premium Access!**
Enjoy exclusive features!

(No payment information is required.)

Want to save this reading content?
Tap this button to add it to 'My Reading'!
tutorial_reading_frame_2: To help you understand better, we’ve broken the text into **easy-to-read sentences**!
tutorial_reading_frame_3: Like a sentence? Tap this button to save it to 'Flashcards' for review later!
tutorial_reading_frame_4: Tap this button to hear the audio and improve your pronunciation!
tutorial_reading_frame_5:
Need translations?
Tap this button to see the meaning of each sentence!
tutorial_writing_frame_1: Practice writing in Korean and get real feedback from a native teacher!
tutorial_writing_frame_2: Your corrections will be saved under **'Writing'** in the main menu. Check them anytime!
tutorial_writing_frame_3: You can request up to **3 corrections at a time**. Use them wisely!
tutorial_writing_frame_4: Choose a question and start writing in Korean now! ✨

Want to remove a flashcard?
**Press and hold** to see the delete option!
tutorial_flashcard_frame_3: Review your saved flashcards **daily** and watch your Korean skills grow!
